testcase.name: TC 01_ User should create a new customer by filling out the required fields
testcase.system-out: Given the user goes to gmi_login_url and signs in as an Employee............passed And user clicks on My Operations............................................passed And click on Manage Customers...............................................passed And click on Create a new Customer..........................................passed

testcase.name: TC 02_ The date cannot be typed earlier, in the past, at the time of creation a customer
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on create date box........................................passed And enter a date earlier than the time of creation a customer...............passed Then verify if it is an invalid input.......................................passed

testcase.name: TC 03_ User can select Zelle Enrolled optionally and save it
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on zelle enrolled.........................................passed Then verify if zelle enrolled is true.......................................passed

testcase.name: TC 04_ User can choose a user from the registration and it cannot be blank
testcase.system-out: Given user selects a user from dropdown.....................................passed Then verify if selected user is valid.......................................passed

testcase.name: TC 05_ User box can not be blank
testcase.system-out: Given user leaves user box empty............................................passed Then verify user box can not be blank.......................................passed

testcase.name: TC 06_ User can choose an account created on manage accounts
testcase.system-out: Given user selects an account from account dropdown.........................passed Then verify if selected account is valid....................................passed
